normal.description: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The carrots take the gamey edge off the meat, and the sauce brings it all together sweetly. The perfect warm dish for a cold winter night.
normal.effect: Decreases all party member's climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s.

delicious.description: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The warm honey draws out the flavor of the meat, creating a flavor explosion akin to bathing in the warm summer sun.
delicious.effect: Decreases all party member's climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s.

suspicious.description: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The sauce has stuck like glue to the meat, forming a homogeneous mass that tastes neither of honey nor meat.
suspicious.effect: Decreases all party member's climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s.
